statements: SELECT * FROM student_assignments;
SELECT assignment_description, submission_date FROM student_assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id FROM student_assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_assignments WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_description, submission_date FROM student_assignments ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_assignments WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_description, submission_date FROM student_assignments WHERE assignment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_assignments FROM student_assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_assignments > 2;
SELECT * FROM student_assignments WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31';
SELECT student_id, MAX(submission_date) AS last_submission FROM student_assignments GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY last_submission ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'B';
SELECT student_name, assignment_name FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'C';
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT teacher_name, grade_given FROM teachers WHERE grade_given = 'B';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A'
SELECT student_name, student_grade, assignment_name FROM students WHERE grade_given = 'B'
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_grade FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John' AND assignment_id = 101
SELECT teacher_name, grade_given, feedback_given FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1
SELECT student_name, student_grade, teacher_name, grade_given FROM students JOIN teachers ON students.student_id = teachers.student_id
SELECT assignment_id, teacher_id, assignment_name, deadline, student_id FROM assignments;
SELECT student_id, assignment_name, deadline, assignment_id, teacher_id FROM assignments;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_name, student_id, deadline FROM assignments WHERE teacher_id = 5;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, teacher_id FROM assignments WHERE deadline >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE assignment_id = 3 AND student_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, grade FROM assignments JOIN grades ON assignments.assignment_id = grades.assignment_id WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade_value) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT assignment_name, feedback_text FROM Assignments INNER JOIN Feedback ON Assignments.assignment_id = Feedback.assignment_id ORDER BY assignment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Assignments.assignment_id = Grades.assignment_id
SELECT assignment_name, feedback_text FROM Assignments JOIN Feedback ON Assignments.assignment_id = Feedback.assignment_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, grade FROM Assignments JOIN Grades ON Assignments.assignment_id = Grades.assignment_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT teacher_name, feedback_text FROM Teachers JOIN Feedback ON Teachers.teacher_id = Feedback.teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Assignments ON Grades.assignment_id = Assignments.assignment_id;
